channel.title: Paper on the entrepreneur, Mary Kay Ash
channel.description:
I have to write a paper on the entrepreneur, Mary Kay Ash. I need as much information I can find, and I need a total of 5 resources. I have a few resources so far, and those are:
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Kay_Ash http://www.answers.com/topic/mary-kay-ash http://www.dallasnews.com/s/dws/spe/2001/marykayash/extra.html
And the information I need to get is: - Educational Background - Personal history - family, spouses, children, ethic background, etc - Previous work experience - What makes them an entrepreneur (what they did invent or make better) and what makes them a leader in the business community - Since she passed on, please share how they have affected the industry they were a part of
If anyone can supply a few different links from the ones I listed with information I need, please post. Thank you.
~Ron :) *Will Give Cookies To Helpers*[br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2007, 11:39:26 AM[/size][hr]Thanks! :D

item.title: Paper on the entrepreneur, Mary Kay Ash
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I have to write a paper on the entrepreneur, Mary Kay Ash. I need as much information I can find, and I need a total of 5 resources. I have a few resources so far, and those are:

en.wikipedia.org

Mary Kay Ash

Mary Kay Ash (May 12, 1918 – November 22, 2001) was an American businesswoman and founder of Mary Kay Cosmetics, Inc. Mary Kay Ash, born Mary Kathlyn Wagner in Hot Wells, Harris County, Texas, was the daughter of Edward Alexander and Lula Vember Hastings Wagner. Her mother was trained as a nurse and later became a manager of a restaurant in Houston. Ash attended Dow Elementary School and Reagan High School in Houston, and graduated in 1934. Ash married Ben Rogers at age 17. They had three child...


http://www.answers.com/topic/mary-kay-ash
http://www.dallasnews.com/s/dws/spe/2001/marykayash/extra.html

And the information I need to get is:

  • Educational Background
  • Personal history - family, spouses, children, ethic background, etc
  • Previous work experience
  • What makes them an entrepreneur (what they did invent or make better) and what makes them a leader in the business community
  • Since she passed on, please share how they have affected the industry they were a part of

If anyone can supply a few different links from the ones I listed with information I need, please post. Thank you.

~Ron Will Give Cookies To Helpers[br][size=1]Posted on: June 14, 2007, 11:39:26 AM[/size][hr]Thanks!
